translations.tl: This is the {GuiX} text demo! {now with more options}

The GuiX API for text rendering offers a variety of layout options and features, such as: horizontal and vertical alignment, justification, ellipsis, line/word wrapping, unicode support, text highlighting, color gradients and shadows.
The text rendering also supports inline formatting options such as {i}italic text{/i}, {b}bold text{/b} and {u}underlined{/u} text, through the use of special formatting tags enclosed in {lb} and {rb} brackets. Custom formatting tags can be added by the application to render inline images, such as this {GuiX} tag.
Below is a fragment of text that demonstrates support for unicode text.
「当ゲームは、猛烈に弾幕好きな開発者が、比較的以上弾幕好きなプレイヤーの為に作成いたしました。弾幕ラヴな方はもちろん、シューティングって何が面白いの?って疑問に思っている方も、ぜひプレイしてみてください」
(taken from the Japanese 東方紅魔郷 manual.)
